text: Hylke Wybe Tromp (27 July 1935 - 14 February 2021) was a Dutch polemologist.Hylke Tromp (1935-2021) was als polemoloog een BNâ€™er tijdens de Koude Oorlog De Volkskrant 20 februari 2021 He was born in Sneek, Netherlands. Beginning in the 1960s, he worked at the Polemological Institute. In 1980, he was appointed professor at the University of Groningen.Reformatorisch Dagblad, 9 januari 1980 He was a member of the advisory board of the International Peace Institute (IIP) in Vienna.Website IIP Tromp died on 14 February 2021 in Groningen, Netherlands at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Dutch academics Category:Writers from Friesland
title: Hylke Tromp
